verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity<s%>, in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>struck<s%>, in the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was upon <S%H935>me<s%>, and brought me there.

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5117>set<s%> me upon a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, by which was as the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H376>there<s%>, and, behold, there was a man, whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7200>behold<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon all that I shall <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H4616>you<s%>; for to the intent that I might <S%H7200>show<s%> them unto you are you <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5046>here<s%>: declare all that you <S%H7200>see<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And behold a <S%H2346>wall<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and in the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> long by the <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a hand <S%H2948>breadth<s%>: so he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and the <S%H6967>height<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> which <S%H6440>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> <S%H4058>there<s%>, and measured the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, which was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H259>gate<s%>, which was one <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>.

And every little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and between the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> also the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> he the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H8147>there<s%>, two <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H1004>inward<s%>.

And the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>eastward<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this <S%H6311>side<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H6311>side<s%>; they <S%H7969>three<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>: and the <S%H352>posts<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> measure on this side and on that <S%H4060>side<s%>.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

The <S%H1366>space<s%> also <S%H6440>before<s%> the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on this <S%H1366>side<s%>, and the space was one <S%H520>cubit<s%> on that <S%H8372>side<s%>: and the little chambers were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H8337>side<s%>, and six cubits on that <S%H520>side<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> then the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of one little <S%H8372>chamber<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of <S%H7341>another<s%>: the breadth was <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, <S%H6607>door<s%> against <S%H6607>door<s%>.

And there were <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> to the little <S%H8372>chambers<s%>, and to their <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H6441>inside<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and likewise to the <S%H361>arches<s%>: and <S%H2474>windows<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6441>inward<s%>: and upon each <S%H352>post<s%> were palm <S%H8561>trees<s%>.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, <S%H3957>and<s%>, behold, there were chambers, and a <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were upon the <S%H7531>pavement<s%>.
